Author: M.Trucker.Bear
Message: Hello

Author: Moderator
Message: Welcome M.Trucker.Bear.

Author: M.Trucker.Bear
Message: Hello

Author: Moderator
Message: Thank you for participating in this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the next posts, I'll be going over the rules of the "game" you're about to play.

Author: Moderator
Message: Once I'll be done, I'll ask you if you've understood the rules, and if you haven't I'll explain them in different words.

Author: M.Trucker.Bear
Message: Okay

Author: Moderator
Message: You're about to talk to Andrew. Andrew is a fictive character that has been completely created for the purpose of this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: You'll be talking to him twice.

Author: Moderator
Message: The only difference between the two conversations you'll have with him, is that in one of them Andrew will be played by a real human.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the other, it will be played by an Artificial Intelligence we are developing.

Author: Moderator
Message: We will call the Human and the Artificial Intelligence the Actors.

Author: Moderator
Message: The order in which you'll be talking to each Actor is random.

Author: Moderator
Message: You will not be talking twice with the same Actor.

Author: Moderator
Message: Both the Artificial Intelligence and the Human will try to portray the same Andrew in the most convincing way they can.

Author: Moderator
Message: Your goal is simple. After talking to the two actors, you'll have to guess which one was the Artificial Intelligence and which one was the Human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Whenever you have made your decision, you are able to stop the conversation.

Author: Moderator
Message: Each conversation will last for 15 minutes maximum if you do not decide to stop it before.

Author: Moderator
Message: Please, keep your posts to text only (No smileys, no links... etc)

Author: Moderator
Message: Do not type more than one post per answer.

Author: Moderator
Message: Do you understand the rules and what you have to do?

Author: M.Trucker.Bear
Message: Yes

Author: Moderator
Message: Good. Andrew will start the conversation. The 15 minutes will start after your answer.

Author: Moderator
Message: Are you ready?

Author: M.Trucker.Bear
Message: yes

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: M.Trucker.Bear
Message: Hi!

Author: Andrew
Message: How are you doing?

Author: M.Trucker.Bear
Message: I'm not sure.

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh? Is there something wrong?

Author: M.Trucker.Bear
Message: Yes my father has late stage dementia.  I authorized hospice care for him today.

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh... I'm sorry to hear that.

Author: M.Trucker.Bear
Message: It's sad that he will be passing soon, but I'm relieved to know that the horizon for the end of his suffering is visible.  I'm not sure if that makes me a bad person or not.

Author: Andrew
Message: I think it's quite understandable really. You need to live, and it's better to live knowing that you don't have to worry about the pain of people you care about.

Author: M.Trucker.Bear
Message: Have you had any relatives with dementia?

Author: Andrew
Message: I don't, no.

Author: M.Trucker.Bear
Message: That's relieving to hear.   It's a terribly unsettling disease.

Author: Andrew
Message: I've had a friend with the pathological case of depression, but that's a different disease.

Author: M.Trucker.Bear
Message: Quite.  I've had friends who have suffered from clinical depression as well.  I'm sorry you had to go through that.  It is difficult having somebody who you can't help no matter what you try.

Author: Andrew
Message: I imagine on that aspect of it at least, depression and dementia aren't that different. Maybe the intensity though.

Author: M.Trucker.Bear
Message: Is your friend okay?

Author: Andrew
Message: He was alright the last time we talked yes. It's his birthday soon.

Author: M.Trucker.Bear
Message: Good.  How do I stop this conversation?

Author: Moderator
Message: Conversation Interrupted!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to (This is not your final answer)

Author: M.Trucker.Bear
Message: AI

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright. We'll start the next conversation. Andrew will begin, and you'll have 15 minutes again after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: M.Trucker.Bear
Message: Yes

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: M.Trucker.Bear
Message: Hi!

Author: Andrew
Message: How are you doing?

Author: M.Trucker.Bear
Message: I'm okay.  I took my car into the shop today and learned that it needs new tires, and that it will cost $500 to replace a side mirror.

Author: Andrew
Message: Damn. Always nice to have unexpected things to spend money on.

Author: M.Trucker.Bear
Message: For a certain value of nice.  A small value of nice.  How are you doing?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm doing alright.

Author: M.Trucker.Bear
Message: Any unexpected expenses like mine hit you recently?

Author: Andrew
Message: Had our two cars drop dead mid-January, other than that no.

Author: M.Trucker.Bear
Message: Two is especially unlucky, especially if you live where January is winter.

Author: Andrew
Message: Yeah. We only replaced one though.

Author: M.Trucker.Bear
Message: What killed them?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm not really sure actually.

Author: M.Trucker.Bear
Message: That's surprising.  You didn't have a mechanic or a automotively inclined person (yourself included) investigate them?

Author: Andrew
Message: They are my mother's cars. I just take the bus.

Author: M.Trucker.Bear
Message: Do you have any questions for me?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm not feeling really creative, they might be boring.

Author: M.Trucker.Bear
Message: That's fine

Author: Andrew
Message: What are you up to tonight?

Author: M.Trucker.Bear
Message: I'm going to go to the gym and then have dinner at home with my husband.

Author: Andrew
Message: That sounds quite nice actually.

Author: M.Trucker.Bear
Message: Then I'll probably do some work on a D&D character for this Saturday's game.

Author: Andrew
Message: I've never played D&D before.

Author: M.Trucker.Bear
Message: It's fun with the right group of players.

Author: M.Trucker.Bear
Message: Otherwise it is a tremendous bore.

Author: Moderator
Message: [Please keep it to one post only]

Author: Andrew
Message: I can understand that yeah.

Author: M.Trucker.Bear
Message: stop conversation

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to in the first conversation?

Author: M.Trucker.Bear
Message: AI

Author: Moderator
Message: On a scale from 1 (not sure at all) to 7 (certain), how confident are you of your answer?

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright thank you for your participation! If you've given your e-mail, we'll send you some information about the results of this study in the coming months.

Author: Moderator
Message: If you have any comments you'd like to share, feel free to do it now. Otherwise you can now close this window.
